data.title: Ocean Science Lecture Series
data.text:
2024 JOHN & BARBARA FERRERA OCEAN SCIENCE LECTURE SERIES

The John & Barbara Ferrera Ocean Science Lecture Series provides a forum for the community to learn about FAU Harbor Branchâ€™s most recent discoveries directly from the scientists and engineers who make them.

Lectures are held on Wednesdays at 4 p.m. in the FAU Harbor Branch Johnson Marine Education Center Auditorium. Presentations will also be livestreamed and recorded.

Lectures are free and open to the public; however advance registration is required to attend. This one-time registration will provide you with a pass for the entire season.

Register Now Watch Live

Please see the schedule below and for additional information contact the Ocean Discovery Visitors Center at 772-242-2293.

2024 John & Barbara Ferrera Ocean Science Lecture Series Schedule
